definition: see 居心叵測|居心叵测[ju1 xin1 po3 ce4]

sentences.english: That teacher told my sister , don't learn much more English!
sentences.chinese: 記住不要再像我妹妹一樣被一些居心叵測的人利用。

sentences.english: This manoeuvre of his is a diabolical conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 他這一手是一個居心叵測的大陰謀。

sentences.english: The snake is up to no good.
sentences.chinese: 這條蛇真是居心叵測啊。

sentences.english: This maneuver of his is a diabolical conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 他這一手是一個居心叵測的大陰謀。

sentences.english: There's nothing in the world which has more ulterior motives than advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 世界上沒有比廣告更居心叵測的。

sentences.english: The financial crisis grows weirder by the day.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，金融危機的走向變得愈發神祕叵測。

sentences.english: This is where the solution to the swine flu mystery comes in.
sentences.chinese: 這個背景就是豬流感解決方案神祕叵測的由來。

sentences.english: In the wake of Mara's funeral, Luke turned his attentions to Jacen and his mercurial motives.
sentences.chinese: 瑪拉的葬禮過後，盧克察覺到傑森心懷叵測。

sentences.english: In war we must always leave room for strokes of fortune, and accidents that cannot be foreseen – Polybius.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭中我們爲謀取財富而離鄉背井，前途叵測。

sentences.english: That man has sinister designs. You must guard against his every move.
sentences.chinese: 這個人心懷叵測，對他的一舉一動，都要嚴加提防。
